summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5365 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 78, Lake Union Shore Lands and Block 1, Mercer's Waterfront Addition, being the alley between Westlake Avenue North and 9th Avenue North, from Mercer Street to Roy Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 63595, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
